summary: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind.
cast: Kate Beckinsale|Stephen Rea|Michael Ealy|Theo James|India Eisley|Sandrine Holt|Charles Dance|Kris Holden-Ried|Jacob Blair|Adam Greydon Reid|Catlin Adams|Robert Lawrenson|Lee Majdoub|John Innes|Tyler McClendon|Panou|Ian Rozylo|Benita Ha|Christian Tessier|Kurt Max Runte|Mark Gibbon|Richard Cetrone|Dan Payne|Aaron Atkins|Wes Bentley|Joe Censoplano|Preston Cook|Leslie Hucul|Scott Speedman|Sanny van Heteren|Mark White
keywords: vampire|selene character|woman fights a man|woman murders a man|murderess
director: Directors: Måns Mårlind (as Mårlind), Björn Stein (as Stein)
title: Underworld: El despertar
